name: Genopets
introduce: Genopets is a Free-to-Play, Move-to-Earn NFT mobile game on Solana that makes it fun and rewarding to live an active lifestyle. A Genopet is player's digital pet whose evolution and growth is inextricably linked to his own. The steps players take every day power their journey through the Genoverse as players explore, battle, and evolve — earning crypto while playing.
